Reel Roulette

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery

Reel Roulette is a website that will generate a random movie and a video trailer using The Movie Database api and Youtubeâ€™s video search api. Users can select a movie genre and get a movie generated based upon that genre, or they can select the roulette option to get an even more random selection.

View Project on GitHub

Weather Dashboard

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

A user can use the search bar to search for a specific city. When they do so, the user will be presented with the current weather along with a 5-day forecast. The city will also be saved as a button below the search bar so the user can quickly access the weather information for previously searched cities.

View Project on GitHub

Work Day Scheduler

Built With: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap

This is a simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. This app will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS powered by jQuery.
